DOC.brief_summary: This study determine MK3614 , give single dos , safe well tolerate healthy male male subject mild moderate hypertension .
DOC.criteria: Healthy subject 18 45 year age ; otherwise healthy subject 18 55 year age newly diagnose grade 1 2 hypertension Subject good general health Subject nonsmoker Subject history stroke , seizure major neurological disease Subject functional disability interfere rise sit position stand position Subject family history bleed clot disorder Subject history cancer Subject unable refrain anticipates use prescription nonprescription medication study Subject consume excessive amount alcohol caffeine Subject major surgery , donate blood participate another investigational study past 4 week .
